chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Einar, p. 627—One of the Asha'man. He was stationed with Kwamesa and charged with protecting the dragons from the Sharan army. He was killed by Demandred with balefire; Demandred was the head of a circle of 72 at the time, and his balefire burned out Einar's thread several hours into the past.
